sentence.Network_en: Any of various birds of the order Galliformes, especially the common, widely domesticated chicken ( Gallus gallus ).
sentence.Network_cn: 鸟禽类鸡形目里任何一种鸟, 尤指普通的 、 广泛家养的小鸡 ( 原鸡 )

sentence.Network_en: Peacocks are classified in the phylum Chordata, subphylum Vertebrata , class Aves , order Galliformes, family Phasianidae.
sentence.Network_cn: 孔雀被认为是脊索动物类,脊索动物亚门, 鸟类.
